channel.title: philosophy on Michaela
channel.description: Recent content in philosophy on Michaela

item.title: Existential dread
item.description: Sometimes, I get this horrible feeling in my stomach. It’s happens in a moment where I sort of realise that I am an actual human on the earth. It’s a strange sensation. I feel this pit in my stomach, and the world seems a bit too real for a couple of seconds.
item.content:encoded: Sometimes, I get this horrible feeling in my stomach. It’s happens in a moment where I sort of realise that I am an actual human on the earth. It’s a strange sensation. I feel this pit in my stomach, and the world seems a bit too real for a couple of seconds.
